local_intent: Ensure the brown object is visible, align to it, execute a short leftward push (270 deg, 0.10 m), retreat, and verify no contact.
assumptions: Leftward push (270 deg) is unobstructed for at least 0.10 m on the table surface
Camera can recover visibility via spiral scan if initially lost
Post-push retreat path is clear to avoid lingering contact
coherence_with_global: Replicates global flow: perceive (IsObjectVisible/Scan), approach (ApproachAndAlign with retry), act (Push with specified params), and exit safe (Retreat, then no-contact check). Parameters match global timeouts and distances.
